errors.error_description: Logical order error - running provision command after entering virtualenv instead of before
correction_candidates: Remove the provision command from step 5 since it was already run in step 3
Move the provision command to step 2 before creating the virtual environment
Replace the provision command with an activation command in step 5
Run the provision command twice - once before and once after entering the virtualenv
errors.golden_answer: Remove the provision command from step 5 since it was already run in step 3
